title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.


### OS

_No response_

title: [PR] docs: Add mobile app strategy and enhance development toolkit section
summary:
- Add comprehensive Mobile App Strategy with tiered privacy model
- Tier 1 (Lite): View-only, maximum privacy, no LLM
- Tier 2 (Pro): On-device LLM (Gemma 2B), high privacy
- Tier 3 (Cloud): Optional cloud LLM with explicit consent
- Emphasize Spec-Kit and Ralph Wiggum as mandatory development tools
